name: Performapal Fire Mufflerlion
effectText: Once per turn, if a Pendulum Monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle, after damage calculation: You can make that monster you control gain 200 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase, and if you do, it can make a second attack in a row.
pendEffect: When a Pendulum Monster you control is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone.
